title: Senior Community 55+
posting_body: ['All residents must be over the age of 55.', '\uf0a7', 'All residents’ gross income must be under $38,580.00 for a one-person household, for the first year of residency.', 'All two person households must be under $44,100.00, for the first year of residency.', 'Rental Rates and Deposits', '• One Bedroom Apartments $925.00 per month!', '• Two Bedroom Apartments $1125.00', '• Carport rental only $20.00 per month!', '• Pet Fee is $10.00 per month and a $150.00 additional deposit (under 35lbs), non-refundable.', '• Security Deposit security deposit $250.00', '• $0.00 Application Fee until May 1st.', '• *Includes, Heat, Water and Service Requests', 'COMFORT', 'Emergency Response System', 'Main Entry Access System', 'Smoke and Fire Alarm', 'Fully Equipped Kitchens', 'Balcony or Patio (most units)', 'Wall-to-Wall Carpeting', 'Individual Climate Controls', 'Pre-Wired for Cable Television', 'Elevator Service', 'CONVENIENCE', 'Maintenance-Free Services', 'Hair Salon', 'Transportation Access', 'Wellness Center', 'Storage Rooms', 'Washers/Dryers on Each Floor', 'Spiritual Programs', 'COMPANIONSHIP', 'Social, Recreational, and', 'Educational Events', 'Media Room', 'Fitness Center', 'Library and Lounges', 'Small Pets Welcome', 'Dog Park!', 'Spacious Community rooms for visiting', 'Active Resident Association', 'Walking Paths', 'Screened-In Porch', 'Equal housing opportunity', 'Visit our website', '<URL>']
